messages.content: I want to know about my loan capabilities and help me to improve my cibil score

It looks like getting a new loan might be tricky at the moment due to your current financial commitments.

- Your CIBIL score is 683, which is acceptable but can be improved for better offers.
- Your current monthly loan payments (EMIs) of ₹25,000 are higher than the recommended limit of ₹24,000 based on your income.
- To improve your CIBIL score, make sure all your EMI payments are always on time.
- Try to reduce your existing loan or credit card outstanding amounts to free up your budget.
- Keep your credit card balance below 30% of your limit for healthier CIBIL.
I am planning to take a home loan so any suggestions?

Based on a tight check, you might qualify for a new loan of up to about 2.25 lakhs.

- Your CIBIL score is 683, which is lower than the 700+ banks usually look for. Improving this will boost your loan chances.
- Your existing loan payments already take up 42% of your monthly income. Banks generally prefer this ratio to be below 40%.
- Try to close smaller loans or credit card balances this month. This frees up your monthly budget for new loan payments.
- Always pay all your dues on time and regularly check your credit report for accuracy. This will help improve your CIBIL score.
